meanings.definition: A person who holds a title or championship.
meanings.sent1: The titlists proudly displayed their trophies.
meanings.sent2: The titlists were celebrated for their impressive victories.
meanings.sent3: The titlists joked about needing a bigger trophy shelf.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sports, titlists are the kings and queens of the arena.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered loudly for the titlists as they raised their championship belts.

meanings.sent1: We invited the titlists to a special awards ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The titlists posed for a group photo with their medals.
meanings.sent3: The titlists shared stories of their journey to victory.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with excitement as the titlists entered.
meanings.sent5: The titlists' names were engraved on the prestigious trophy.
